people_also_ask.question: Is NiGHTS a boy or a girl?
people_also_ask.heading: NiGHTS is a genderless being, who according to the game's director, Takashi Iizuka, is up to the player to interpret. This means that they can be referred to by any pronouns (he/him, she/her or they/them) and that it is up for each player to choose how they want to see NiGHTS as (male, female or neither).

people_also_ask.question: Is NiGHTS into Dreams on steam?
people_also_ask.heading: NiGHTS Into Dreams on Steam. Slip off into the dream world and go on an aerial adventure as NiGHTS in this classic Saturn remake. Collect Ideya (colored orbs), rack up points, and battle bosses to help Elliot and Claris save Nightopia from Wizeman the Wicked.17-Dec-2012

knowledge_panel.description: nights into dreams is a 1996 action game developed by sonic team and published by sega for the sega saturn. the story follows teenagers elliot edwards and claris sinclair, who enter nightopia, a dream world where all dreams take place. wikipedia
